description:
_create_instance_obj() sets a bunch of attrs on the new object, but doesn't call .obj_reset_changes(), so they are essentially not treated as committed.

Not currently a problem in tests... but might be in the future, as this is technically wrong.
title: fake instance objects in test_compute have stale changes

comments.content:
_create_instance_obj() sets a bunch of attrs on the new object, but doesn't call .obj_reset_changes(), so they are essentially not treated as committed.

Not currently a problem in tests... but might be in the future, as this is technically wrong.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens
